Item.sqlserver_body:
create procedure bcs_MPP_affectedItemFloatNewItem(@affectedItemID char(32), @newVersionItemID char(32)) AS BEGIN UPDATE [MPP_AFFECTED_ITEM] SET NEW_ITEM_ID = @newVersionItemID WHERE ID = @affectedItemID AND ( NOT EXISTS(select ppr.id from [PPR] ppr where ppr.id = (select SOURCE_ID from [PPR_AFFECTED_ITEM] where RELATED_ID = @affectedItemID) AND (ppr.STATE = 'Released')) )
select * from [MPP_AFFECTED_ITEM] where id = @affectedItemID END
Item.name: bcs_MPP_affectedItemFloatNewItem
